vote.title: Reppointment of Robert Loversidge, Jr., of Schooley Caldwell, 300 Marconi Blvd., Suite 100, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Downtown Commission replacing with a new term expiration date of 06/01/2027 (resumé attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Reppointment of Robert Loversidge, Jr., of Schooley Caldwell, 300 Marconi Blvd., Suite 100, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Downtown Commission replacing with a new term expiration date of 06/01/2027 (resumé attached).
